title: Confiscator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Confiscate an authorized target’s abilities.

> Use a confiscated ability on an authorized target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Confiscating someone’s abilities roleblocks them through immunity the next night.

> When you use a confiscated ability, you will use the main ability you confiscated (host decided what the main ability is)

> You will not know what abilities you confiscated, but you will receive feedback. You will also be told who/what you can target the night after you confiscate abilities.

desc:
Post 2108
*"I'll be taking that. Hmm... what even is this..? Guess I'll find out by using it on you."*
